trans-unit.source: Excel application object where you want to open the workbook

seg-source.mrk: Excel application object where you want to open the workbook

target.mrk: Excel application object where you want to open the workbook

trans-unit.source: Path and filename of the file to be opened

seg-source.mrk: Path and filename of the file to be opened

target.mrk: Path and filename of the file to be opened

trans-unit.source: [optional] True opens the workbook as read-only (default = False)

seg-source.mrk: True opens the workbook as read-only (default = False)

target.mrk: True opens the workbook as read-only (default = False)

trans-unit.source: [optional] True specifies that the workbook window will be visible (default = True)

seg-source.mrk: True specifies that the workbook window will be visible (default = True)

target.mrk: True specifies that the workbook window will be visible (default = True)

trans-unit.source: [optional] The password that was used to read-protect the workbook, if any (default is none)

seg-source.mrk: The password that was used to read-protect the workbook, if any (default is none)

target.mrk: The password that was used to read-protect the workbook, if any (default is none)

trans-unit.source: [optional] The password that was used to write-protect the workbook, if any (default is none)

seg-source.mrk: The password that was used to write-protect the workbook, if any (default is none)

target.mrk: The password that was used to write-protect the workbook, if any (default is none)

trans-unit.source: [optional] Specifies the way external references (links) in the file are updated (default = keyword Default)

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the way external references (links) in the file are updated (default = keyword Default)

target.mrk: Specifies the way external references (links) in the file are updated (default = keyword Default)

trans-unit.source: Default: Excel prompts the user to decide how to update links.

seg-source.mrk: Excel prompts the user to decide how to update links.

target.mrk: Excel prompts the user to decide how to update links.

trans-unit.source: an workbook object. @extended is set to 1 if $bReadOnly = False but read-write access could not be granted. Please see the Remarks section for details.

seg-source.mrk: @extended is set to 1 if $bReadOnly = False but read-write access could not be granted.
Please see the Remarks section for details.

target.mrk: @extended is set to 1 if $bReadOnly = False but read-write access could not be granted.
Please see the Remarks section for details.

trans-unit.source: 1 - $oExcel is not an object or not an application object

seg-source.mrk: 1 - $oExcel is not an object or not an application object

target.mrk: 1 - $oExcel is not an object or not an application object

trans-unit.source: 3 - Unable to open $sFilePath. @extended is set to the COM error code returned by the Open method

seg-source.mrk: @extended is set to the COM error code returned by the Open method

target.mrk: @extended is set to the COM error code returned by the Open method

trans-unit.source: When you set $bReadOnly = False but the document can't be opened read-write @extended is set to 1.

seg-source.mrk: When you set $bReadOnly = False but the document can't be opened read-write @extended is set to 1.

target.mrk: When you set $bReadOnly = False but the document can't be opened read-write @extended is set to 1.

trans-unit.source: The Workbook was opened read-only because it has already been opened by another user/task or the file is set to read-only by the filesystem.

seg-source.mrk: The Workbook was opened read-only because it has already been opened by another user/task or the file is set to read-only by the filesystem.

target.mrk: The Workbook was opened read-only because it has already been opened by another user/task or the file is set to read-only by the filesystem.

trans-unit.source: If you modify the workbook you need to use _Excel_BookSaveAs() to save it to another location or with another name.

seg-source.mrk: If you modify the workbook you need to use _Excel_BookSaveAs() to save it to another location or with another name.

target.mrk: If you modify the workbook you need to use _Excel_BookSaveAs() to save it to another location or with another name.

trans-unit.source: When setting $bVisible = False when opening a Workbook make sure to set the Workbook to visible again before saving the Workbook.

seg-source.mrk: When setting $bVisible = False when opening a Workbook make sure to set the Workbook to visible again before saving the Workbook.

target.mrk: When setting $bVisible = False when opening a Workbook make sure to set the Workbook to visible again before saving the Workbook.

trans-unit.source: Use $oExcel.Windows($oWorkbook.Name).Visible = True to make the Workbook visible again.

seg-source.mrk: Visible = True to make the Workbook visible again.

target.mrk: Visible = True to make the Workbook visible again.

trans-unit.source: Else the Workbook will not be shown when you manually open it using Excel.

seg-source.mrk: Else the Workbook will not be shown when you manually open it using Excel.

target.mrk: Else the Workbook will not be shown when you manually open it using Excel.

trans-unit.source: Most of the time this parameter is not needed. Using $bVisible = False in _Excel_Open is the preferred way.

seg-source.mrk: Most of the time this parameter is not needed.
Using $bVisible = False in _Excel_Open is the preferred way.

target.mrk: Most of the time this parameter is not needed.
Using $bVisible = False in _Excel_Open is the preferred way.

trans-unit.source: If $bUpdateLinks is set to Default the user is only prompted if $bDisplayAlerts is set to True in function _Excel_Open.

seg-source.mrk: If $bUpdateLinks is set to Default the user is only prompted if $bDisplayAlerts is set to True in function _Excel_Open.

target.mrk: If $bUpdateLinks is set to Default the user is only prompted if $bDisplayAlerts is set to True in function _Excel_Open.

trans-unit.source: If $bDisplayAlerts is set to False, Excel chooses the default response.

seg-source.mrk: If $bDisplayAlerts is set to False, Excel chooses the default response.

target.mrk: If $bDisplayAlerts is set to False, Excel chooses the default response.

trans-unit.source: Error creating the Excel application object.

target.mrk: Error creating the Excel application object.

trans-unit.source: Open an existing workbook and return its object identifier.
